statements: DELETE FROM token_ownership WHERE owner_address = '0x1234567890' AND amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM token_transactions WHERE receiver_address = '0x9876543210' AND transaction_date < '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM token_ownership WHERE token_id = 123 AND owner_address = '0xabc123'
DELETE FROM token_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0xdef456' AND receiver_address = '0xghi789'
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE from_address = '0x123456789' AND to_address = '0x987654321';
DELETE FROM token_ownership WHERE owner_address = '0x0001' AND token_id = 123;
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE from_address = '0x1111' OR amount < 100.50;
DELETE FROM governance_tokens WHERE token_name = 'Governance Token';
DELETE FROM token_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0xabc123' AND receiver_address = '0xdef456';
